justification: Good read on B’s WR surplus and appetite for injured, committee-upside RBs; RB depth need is real. However, A overpays (Tier 2 RB + TE4) for a WR4, conflicting with A’s urgent need for immediate high ceiling. Little attention to B’s TE redundancy (has a TE1) or A’s RB injuries. Rationale is concise but thin on specifics.
